remarks: A formula equivalent to a bounded one is bounded.  Stated with a commuted (compared with ~ bd0 ) biconditional in the hypothesis, to work better with definitions ( ` ps ` is the definiendum that one wants to prove bounded).  (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.)
statement:
bd0r.min $e |- Bdd ph $.
bd0r.maj $e |- ( ps <-> ph ) $.
bd0r $p |- Bdd ps $.
